home desc.one:
You are now at home.
If you like to hunt something go to forest.
And if you like to buy/sell something go to shop.

forest desc.one:
You are now at forest.
You can hunt here or go back to home.

shop desc.one:
You are now at a shop.
If you want you can buy or sell items here.

market desc.one:
You are now at a marketplace.
You can do trading here for coin and items.

develop desc.one: You are now testing things for development. Please enter commands you want to try
